Header: 51 Division Helps O/L Students in Jaffna
Content: Extending civil community-oriented projects of the 51 Division further for the benefit of G.C.E (O/L) candidates sitting the examination in December, 51 Division Headquarters of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna organized four separate educational seminars in Jaffna schools during 25 - 27 November. The project, proposed by Major General Lalith Ratnayake, General Officer Commanding, 51 Division that got underway at Skandarodai Vidyalaya, Alaveddy Arunothaya Vidyalaya, Velanai Saraswathi Vidyalaya, Jaffna Vidyalaya, Vaddukkodai attracting more than 450 plus aspirants for the examination. The seminar sessions focused largely on Science, Mathematics and English and were attended by popular teachers and lecturers made available by the Jaffna District Education Department authorities. Several senior Officers separately attended inaugural occasions of the seminars.
